name: Flappy Bat (itch) (UchiMama)
description:
NOTE: Please play in Full Screen mode.

An infinite scroller in which the player must dodge obstacles.

Controls

  • Left mouse click to flap higher
  • Space to pause/unpause

If you play, I'd love to hear what your high score was!

----------

Written in C# with Unity.

Art: https://balloon-cart.itch.io/spooky-zone-asset-pack

SFX: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-retro-sfx-pack-43256#d...
